name: Restaurant Wolkoff
description: A fine dining restaurant in a historic building, offering Finnish cuisine with modern twists. Known for their pasta dishes and evening atmosphere.

name: Kehruuhuone
description: A cozy restaurant by Lake Saimaa with beautiful views. Serves traditional Finnish dishes and has a special pasta menu in the evenings.

name: Rosso Lappeenranta
description: Italian-style restaurant chain with a variety of pasta dishes. Family-friendly and open late in the evening.

name: Cafe Majurska
description: A charming cafe in a historic wooden house. Known for its cozy atmosphere and homemade pastries. Great for evening visits.

name: Wanha Makasiini
description: Restaurant in a historic warehouse by the harbor. Specializes in seafood and pasta dishes. Romantic evening atmosphere with lake views.

name: Angus Steak & Wine
description: Upscale steakhouse that also offers pasta dishes. Elegant evening dining with an extensive wine list.

name: Cafe Satamatie 6
description: Waterfront cafe with panoramic views of Lake Saimaa. Relaxed atmosphere, perfect for evening coffee and light meals.
